name: yukae
description: yukae - an anime, manga and novel tracking app for web, mobile and desktop
author: yukae

scripts.build: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=production cross-env BUILD_TARGET=website nuxt build
scripts.dev: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=development cross-env BUILD_TARGET=website nuxt dev
scripts.dev:electron: concurrently -k "cross-env ENVIRONMENT=development BUILD_TARGET=desktop nuxt dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && pnpm dev:electron:start"
scripts.dev:electron:start: cross-env BUILD_TARGET=desktop ENVIRONMENT=development pnpm dlx electron .
scripts.build:electron: pnpm dlx electron-builder install-app-deps && cross-env ENVIRONMENT=production BUILD_TARGET=desktop nuxt build && pnpm build:electron:package
scripts.test:electron: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=production BUILD_TARGET=desktop nuxt build && cross-env ENVIRONMENT=production BUILD_TARGET=desktop pnpm dlx electron .
